alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Weld and west central Logan Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 159 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Stoneham, or 25 miles west of Sterling, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Weld and west central Logan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
